question: Muhammad Ali Jinnah offered blank sheets of paper to which among the following princely states to write the terms to join Pakistan that he would sign?
explanation: Muhammad Ali Jinnah offered blank sheets of paper to the ruler of Jodhpur and Jaisalmer to write the terms to join Pakistan that he would sign. But being a Hindu state Jaisalmer refused the proposal and after the intervention of Lord Mountbatten, Jodhpur also decided to refuse the proposal and joined India.
